name: Cosmoblaster Exodia
description:
Cosmoblaster exodia - You are a brave captain of a galactic cruiser. Take control of a spaceship and fly through many galaxies and nebulae towards your goal. Ruthlessly destroy the space pirates you meet on your way and collect bonuses that will help you in your difficult task. Fight bravely and ruthlessly, hitting enemy ships with your missiles and stay alive in this unequal battle in this sidescroller shooter!

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics ин LEROUI
- Nice soundtrack vinovnick667
